data.text:
hello everyone ,dont trade wiht this guy guanchengcheng,he is a cheater.

he ask me give him game screens and after told me to give him game.

only after he downloaded it he told me he want only DVD format and he will not give me my game.

But before he didn't told me about game format or it's size.

i trade many people in bigsoccer,this is the first time i met such faceless.

Hi everyone. This is Nick from Greece.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RpSYlaBtgz1-vOjMnjj3reF69T1xWnMH/view?usp=sharing

this is my list of games. all old games (from the pre HD era) are in english audio,dvd format, unless listed otherwise (for example avi ,mp4 etc).

a lot of the old games (before 1990) are from master tapes,so hey have very high quality.

i am looking for WC games, euro games and perhaps a few champions league/uefa cup finals/semifinals. i mostly need english audio and true dvd format(not avi convrted to dvd etc) in the highest quality for the old games , and i need HD quality for the new era, but i can accept other formats or other language for rare versions.

i also do collect basketball as well (actually i have more than 10.000 basketball games) in case somebody is interested.

you can email me at nicksavage1981@hotmail.com

thanks

Some of them I even bought, but now it's time to trade

i never expected so many messages for trades when i found this site. this amazing place. i'm so thankful to everyone here. amazing collectors,amazing people.

i have a question to make. i recently received this version of the 1998 WC final Brazil-France in HD (i attach a link with a sample)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/11YDeYGR8CHc110KaW3Df9obHw143FDPM/view?usp=sharing

as you can see it's 720-30fps,english , originally aired by japanese tv (didn't even know that they had broadcasted the final in HD!!).

does anyone have the uncompressed 1080p version or does anyone know where could i possibly find it?

@nick savage

Unless NHK in Japan rebroadcasts it again, doubtful. The only other games among us traders from 1998 in HD are the three matches featuring Japan.

Then there's clips like this one of Beckham's sending off:

From the 1994 World Cup, there's this clip of Baresi and Baggio missing their penalties.

There are games even from 1990 which exist in an early form of HD, but as far as I'm aware all these games are held in the NHK's archives (if they still exist at all).

Hi fellow collectors!

I'm an FC Barcelona collector, but I have been off for quite a while. Please find attached my list of matches (outdated, I've got plenty of new matches, yet the old list still remains valid).

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet...ouid=109956962905890093948&rtpof=true&sd=true

Here's my email if you would like to contact me: master16L@yahoo.com

Also, I'm looking for BBC/ITV coverage of EURO 04, 08 and WC 06, 10 (only HD matches). If you have any of these, I'd be down to trade

Greetings!

Michael

thanks for the reply.

i do know about the 3 japan games ( i already got 2 of them this month) but looks like there's more from 1998 WC in wide screen hd. definitely the final exists full. if it didn't exist, i would have the full game in 720p. the question is who has the uncompressed 1080p version?

i am also aware of those 1994 WC final in hd and the 1990 WC games in some kind of early hd. it happened to watch those clips in youtube too.

but for that england argentina game from 1998 i had no clue. thanks for posting it.

i also heard that the first hd games were in the 1988 olympics from the japanese tv. this is unreal. 1988??? unbelieavable.

PS.I hope NHK has kept the files of those 1990 and 1994 and 1998 hd games. if not they desrved to be skinned alive

obviously my original is the same like all collectors, the 720p 30fps

this is just an upscale 720 to 1080 and frame interpolation 30p to 60p, all done with software by AI (artificial intelligence),it was a very long process for my computer, more than 40 hours

my computer : HP Omen 30L GT13 Intel Core I9 10900K 64GB RTX 3080

I've been looking for that final in 1080 for many years, I asked all my Japanese friends collectors.Unfortunately nobody has
